## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G06100](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G06100)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>NIP7;1, NLM6, NLM8</u>
- **Gene Name:** NOD26-like intrinsic protein 7;1, NOD26-LIKE MIP 6, NOD26-LIKE MIP 8
- **Description:**   NOD26-like intrinsic protein 7;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2082385
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
